body:
Hi Chris,



Thank you so much for the detail explanation! It helps a lot! 

As Abraham mentioned above, I think what I should do is to take the COP into account before adding the thermal loads (Heating, Cooling) to the electrical energy (lighting, equipment), in order to calculate the amount of electricity required for the predicted thermal loads (Heating, Cooling), which depends on the selected energy source and the COP.

Best,

Ding
